title: Broadway Actors Present The Public Speaking Guide For Everyone
description: Written by the founder of a company of leading New York actors who, for twentyyears, have given public speaking training to CEOs and others, this simple to use guide for everyone contains techniques, exercises and tips that takeyou step-by-step through the entire and dynamic process of practicing to giving aspeech. It covers the basics, includes acting techniques that can be easilyunderstood and put to use by everyone; and reveals ways to mine fear toyour advantage. It is divided into three Practicing a Speech,Managing Fear and Giving a Speech and offers original approaches andinsights you will find nowhere else to help you bring speeches and presentations to riveting life.
author: Peitho
